Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by Colorado in 2012...
Traded from Colorado to Minnesota on 2/8/2015 (Going to COL: P I. West, P R. Wagner. Going to MIN: 3B A. Russell, SS G. Cecchini, 2B C. Spangenberg)...
Injured on 4/17/2015 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/27/2015 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/4/2016, off JP Howell (NYA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/14/2016, off Jeff Niemann (SEA)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Tampa Bay on 4/25/2016...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 2016, hitting .293 with 14 HR, 86 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/10/2018, hitting .455 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against New York (A) on 9/23/2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/15/2019, hitting .542 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 2020...
Drove in 6 runs against Cleveland on 4/16/2021...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2021, hitting .387 with 4 HR, 21 RBI...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/31/2022, hitting .615 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2022, hitting .394 with 8 HR, 27 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Chicago (A) on 6/23/2023...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2023, hitting .333 with 9 HR, 30 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Kansas City on 8/22/2023...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/2023, hitting .448 with 5 HR, 12 RBI...
Was selected to the 2024 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/22/2024, hitting .480 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Kansas City on 8/2/2024...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2024, hitting .476 with 9 HR, 26 RBI...
Had 23-game hitting streak snapped on 9/17/2024...
